metadata.title: CVE-2022-41766 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.8, 1.36.x and 1.37.xbefore 1.37.5, and 1.38.x before 1.38.3. Upon an action=rollback operation,the alreadyrolled message can leak a user name (when the user has beenrevision deleted/suppressed).

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
